title: x/build/cmd/release: gotour is copied instead of godoc
body:
The Go 1.7 beta1 binary release tarballs contain an executable file named `bin/godoc` which actually is the Go tour in disguise.

While `go tool tour` is working, `godoc` is missing from the release.

See CL https://golang.org/cl/21703/ - the source argument of the cp function call in line 53 is obviously not right.
